overview:
Performance based marketer, hyper-focused on results, never complacent, ALWAYS testing.

Jacob Shin joined Savings.com in April 2009 to be the driver in the growth and execution of Paid Search, Customer Acquisition/Retention and other Online Marketing initiatives. Prior to joining Savings.com, Jacob successfully managed multi-million dollar, high volume search campaigns across Finance and Travel verticals for Low.com and Lowfares.com, respectively. He has been actively involved in online marketing since starting his own business venture in 2004. Jacob graduated with a bachelorâ€™s degree in Biology from The University of California, San Diego.

milestones.description: Joined Savings.com as the Director of Online Marketing & Customer Acquisition
